name: Players, Please Board the Train
summary: “Welcome, players, to the Dimension Rift Game Express. This train will depart from the E-Level Station and head toward the D-Level Station. Please ensure your personal safety as you board in an orderly manner, and follow the riding rules.”【The riding rules are as follows:】【1. Do not bring non-game items onto the train. (Underwear is an exception.)】【2. Spending is mandatory. (All train staff are unpaid volunteers.)】【3. Do not turn on the lights after lights-out. (Unless you’re exceptionally skilled and fearless.)】“In addition, the train encourages ambushes, brawls, hunting, and other forms of recreation—players are free to choose as they please.”“Have a pleasant journey.”
author: 海晏山
